content: Is Zen broken for you? Cant get to any of the testbot details pages.
Some of Zen CI is always broken. While much of it keeps working.

@docwilmot I've been plagued by https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org/issues/276 for years now. I think that it's most likely the same thing for you nw.

Upon restarting one test set (php53 or php70) through the zen.ci UI, a "-1" is appended to the URL of "details" link of the other test and you get "Page not found". 路 Issue #276 路 backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org
I had what seemed to be a random php70 failure in backdrop/backdrop#1461 So I used the newly-added "restart" feature to restart the tests. This time php70 passed green, but php53 shows as...
It fixed itself at once it seemed.
Yeah, I've noticed in the past that sometimes it gets auto-sorted if you give it enough(?) time ...but most often it doesn't :disappointed:
...been getting a loot of "request timed out" for the zenci/deploy component in my PRs lately :disappointed:
